{"id":565936094,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1633397633,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/565936094/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isv(char c){\n        if(c=='a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u'){\n            return true;\n        }\n        else if(c=='A' || c=='E' || c=='I' || c=='O' || c=='U'){\n            return true;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int l=0,r=s.size()-1;\n        while(r>l){\n            while(!isv(s[l]) && l<s.size()) l++;\n            while(!isv(s[r]) && r>=0) r--;\n            if(r<l) break;\n            swap(s[l],s[r]);\n            l++;\n            r--;\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string"}
